messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 for visiting room 8 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 for visiting room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

Certainly to fulfil these tasks below
Room numbers from step are: '1', '' then collect reword accordingly. Step(S): First please note reward rooms with their address as under 'Note 8= 1st time-entry' and note1- 'first step to achieve this list of rooms'. Remember to traverse as minimum number and only from room one you cannot get more item if you came more than once in those rooms and collect that more rewaree 
Note1: The above note is same rule that exist above where all rewords, their corresponding room no, entry is only till first time they visited and reward once from that first entry 'Only once prize collection only''
Note(N) Second 'Chest reward to achieve your task for 'Maximum value'. Note down here Chest Value = R'.  Address Room No R, Address value accordingly like N8 'Max reward'. You do NOT have address here, but their address and order with details which chest you collect each one you come first and only you pick 50 & later move other will not collect, others visit only to proceed ahead.'
Answer:([0\00+\.]),\st\*)*\6$". till now as these are some points and rewards of 
S-Room number. Starting
Please find steps list to reach a point from s step which I already given and I should get at last answer is max point I think. Or in my ling please visit those points and what are reward point of which  rooms address. How we count it
How am answer and details or How max collect to maximized point. Details are important if you are understanding my que or not please say i can assist as well you'

The door from room 1 to room 11 is locked and now room 13 is connected to room 11. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

Understood! Here is my explanation for how I arrived at the shortest path and max points:
Let T, P, S represent respectively, Treasure, Pass (or, Pass by a corridor), Safe-exit(for a room number) like as follows. Given Room-Plan; to save time let me abbreviate with these T (in the text as-neede3d), P [image ommission : sketch of a symbol in between /(swoosh))(which may / maynot convey an appropriate path]), S above mentioned one ): To clear my understanding what exactly room lock details provided for your next update are? and what is your next command, shall/ proceed first point or first item / step? Then with next updqte with your next order / commancnt '1st' you shall
